text: "This Is My Life" is a song by Romanian musician and producer Edward Maya, featuring vocals by Vika Jigulina. It was released in May 2010 as the second single from his The Stereo Love Show album, following his international hit "Stereo Love". ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2010) !Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |Romania (Romanian Top 100) | style="text-align:center;"|3 |- |- |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2010) !Position |- |Belgium (Ultratop Wallonia) |align="center"|71 |- |European Hot 100 Singleshttp://www.billboard.com/charts/year-end/2010/european-hot-100-singles |align="center"|71 |- |Romania (Romanian Top 100) |align="center"|53 |} ==Sales== |- |France (SNEP) | |27,100 |- ==References== Category:2010 singles Category:Edward Maya songs Category:Romanian songs Category:2010 songs Category:Songs written by Vika Jigulina Category:Songs written by Edward Maya Category:Song recordings produced by Edward Maya
title: This Is My Life (Edward Maya song)
